description:
Kyrie talks about his past to Caramia and Scarlet, but once he’s finished, he tells them it was all a lie. Axel emerges to see Caramia on the ground and Kyrie holding a water gun. Kyrie has doused Caramia, fully knowing he hates water...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Color Of Ripe Golden Grains
